gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To lend someone something
pomeni nekomu dovoliti, da določeno obdobje nekaj ima ali uporablja, na primer naš denar ali lastnino.

seg.quote: I had to lend him a pound.
She was reading a book I had lent her.

sense.def:
To lend one's support to someone
pomeni podpirati, na primer neko osebo ali skupino.

seg.quote: He was there lending advice and support.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
PREP
‘to’,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lends a particular quality to something else
, nečemu da določeno lastnost.

seg.quote: It would lend credibility to her arguments.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lends itself to being dealt with or considered in a particular way
, ga je možno obravnavati na opisani način.

seg.quote: ...problems which do not lend themselves to simple solutions.
